title: Coronavirus: 'Stay at home' plea as Easter holiday starts
description: Warm weather is expected but the coronavirus lockdown remains in place, authorities warn.
content:
Image copyrightJohn ByfordImage caption
 People do appear to be heeding warnings not to drive to visit coastal towns, like Skegness
People are being warned to stay away from England's beauty spots amid the coronavirus lockdown, despite expected warm weather… [+2705 chars]
